import { IconPhone } from "@tabler/icons-react"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import HeroPages from "../components/HeroPages"; import PlanTrip from "../components/PlanTrip"; import AboutMain from "../images/about/about-main.jpg"; import Box1 from "../images/about/icon1.png"; import Box2 from "../images/about/icon2.png"; import Box3 from "../images/about/icon3.png"; function About() { document.title = "Uberola | About Us"; return ( <>
